sentences.en: Charles thinks he's better than the rest of us, the self - righteous prig!
sentences.cn: 查尔斯认为他比我们大家都强, 真是个自以为是的家伙!

sentences.en: Don’t be such a prig! It’s only a bit of harmless fun!
sentences.cn: 别这么一本正经！只是无伤大雅的玩笑而已！

sentences.en: You are neither a prig nor a bounder.
sentences.cn: 你既不是道学先生又不鲁莽.

words.tran_cn: 一本正经的；自负的；死板的

trans.tran_en: someone who behaves in a morally good way and shows that they disapprove of the way other people behave - used to show disapproval
